001package io.jstach.kiwi.boot;
002
003import java.lang.management.ManagementFactory;
004import java.util.Collections;
005import java.util.HashSet;
006import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009import java.util.Map.Entry;
010import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
011import java.util.Objects;
012import java.util.Set;
013import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue;
014
015import org.jspecify.annotations.Nullable;
016
017import io.jstach.kiwi.kvs.KeyValue;
018import io.jstach.kiwi.kvs.KeyValues;
019import io.jstach.kiwi.kvs.KeyValuesEnvironment;
020import io.jstach.kiwi.kvs.KeyValuesEnvironment.Logger;
021import io.jstach.kiwi.kvs.KeyValuesSystem;
022import io.jstach.kiwi.kvs.Variables;
023
024/**
025 * Kiwi Config is tiny opinionated configuration framework modeled after Spring Boot that
026 * uses Kiwi KVS system to load key values into a Map. It is made to be a slightly better
027 * {@link System#getProperties()}.
028 * <p>
029 * Features are purposely very limited.
030 * <p>
031 * The loading is as follows:
032 * <ol>
033 * <li>System.getProperties and System.getEnv are load for interpolation.</li>
034 * <li>Resource <code>classpath:/application.properties</code> is loaded (but not
035 * required)</li>
036 * <li>Resource <code>profile.classpath:/application__PROFILE__.properties</code> is
037 * loaded (but not required)</li>
038 * </ol>
039 * <h2>Example Usage</h2>
040 * {@snippet :
041 * KiwiConfig.of().getProperty(key); // Use instead of System.getProperty
042 * }
043 *
044 */
045public sealed interface KiwiConfig {
046
047        /**
048         * Analogous to {@link System#getProperty(String)}.
049         * @param key to use for lookup for matching value.
050         * @return value or <code>null</code> if not found.
051         */
052        @Nullable
053        String getProperty(String key);
054
055        /**
056         * Set default properties which will be used in addition to those in the found on
057         * loading. This is analogous to Spring Boots
058         * <code>SpringApplication.setDefaultProperties</code>.
059         * @param properties the additional properties to set
060         */
061        public static void setDefaultProperties(Map<String, String> properties) {
062                Holder.PROPERTIES = KeyValues.builder().add(properties.entrySet()).build();
063        }
064
065        /**
066         * Gets the global config singleton. Analogous to {@link System#getProperties()}.
067         * @return global config that is reloadable.
068         */
069        public static ReloadableConfig of() {
070                return Holder.Hidden.CONFIG;
071        }
072
073        /**
074         * Creates a stable config based on the opinionated loading. Usually {@link #of()} is
075         * the more desirable call.
076         * @return a new loaded stable config.
077         * @see #of()
078         */
079        public static StableConfig create() {
080                return Holder.load();
081        }
082
083        /**
084         * A reloadable config allows reloading but does not guarantee that repeated calls of
085         * {@link #getProperty(String)} and similar will return the same results. Notice that
086         * there is no event propagation or watching of resources. That is am exercise for the
087         * consumer of the library.
088         */
089        sealed interface ReloadableConfig extends KiwiConfig {
090
091                /**
092                 * The current backing stable config (might be generated).
093                 * @return stable config.
094                 */
095                public StableConfig stableConfig();
096
097                /**
098                 * Will reload the config and return the previous config.
099                 * @return previous config.
100                 */
101                public KiwiConfig reload();
102
103        }
104
105        /**
106         * A stable config guarantees that repeated calls of {@link #getProperty(String)} and
107         * similar will return the same result.
108         */
109        non-sealed interface StableConfig extends KiwiConfig {
110
111                /**
112                 * Describes the key like what resource it came from. Stable Config has this
113                 * method because calling describe on reloadable config may generate different
114                 * results.
115                 * @param key to describe.
116                 * @return description.
117                 * @throws NoSuchElementException if the key is missing.
118                 */
119                String describe(String key) throws NoSuchElementException;
120
121                /**
122                 * Generates a map from the config.
123                 * @return key value map of config.
124                 */
125                Map<String, String> toMap();
126
127        }
128
129}
130
131class QueueLogger implements Logger {
132
133        private final ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Event> events = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<>();
134
135        record Event(System.Logger.Level level, String message) {
136        }
137
138        @Override
139        public void init(KeyValuesSystem system) {
140                events.add(new Event(System.Logger.Level.INFO, "Initializing"));
141        }
142
143        @Override
144        public void debug(String message) {
145                events.add(new Event(System.Logger.Level.DEBUG, message));
146
147        }
148
149        @Override
150        public void info(String message) {
151                events.add(new Event(System.Logger.Level.INFO, message));
152        }
153
154        @Override
155        public void warn(String message) {
156                events.add(new Event(System.Logger.Level.WARNING, message));
157        }
158
159        @Override
160        public void closed(KeyValuesSystem system) {
161                System.Logger logger = System.getLogger("io.jstach.kiwi.boot.KiwiConfig");
162                Event e;
163                while ((e = events.poll()) != null) {
164                        logger.log(e.level, e.message);
165                }
166        }
167
168        @Override
169        public void fatal(Exception exception) {
170                var err = System.err;
171                Event e;
172                while ((e = events.poll()) != null) {
173                        err.println("[" + Logger.formatLevel(e.level) + "] io.jstach.kiwi.boot.KiwiConfig - " + e.message);
174                }
175                err.println("[ERROR] io.jstach.kiwi.boot.KiwiConfig - " + exception.getMessage());
176                exception.printStackTrace(err);
177        }
178
179}
180
181final class Holder {
182
183        static volatile @Nullable KeyValues PROPERTIES;
184
185        static class Hidden {
186
187                final static KiwiConfig.ReloadableConfig CONFIG = new WrapperKiwiConfig(load());
188
189        }
190
191        static KiwiConfig.StableConfig load() {
192
193                record BootEnvironment(QueueLogger logger) implements KeyValuesEnvironment {
194                        @Override
195                        public Logger getLogger() {
196                                return this.logger;
197                        }
198                }
199                var logger = new QueueLogger();
200                try (var system = KeyValuesSystem.builder() //
201                        .useServiceLoader()
202                        .environment(new BootEnvironment(logger))
203                        .build()) {
204                        var properties = Holder.PROPERTIES;
205
206                        var loader = system //
207                                .loader();
208                        if (properties != null) {
209                                loader.add("setDefaultProperties", properties);
210                        }
211                        var kvs = loader.variables(Variables::ofSystemProperties)
212                                .variables(Variables::ofSystemEnv)
213                                .variables(RandomVariables::of)
214                                .add("classpath:/application.properties", b -> b.name("application").noRequire(true))
215                                .add("profile.classpath:/application-__PROFILE__.properties", b -> b.name("profiles").noRequire(true))
216                                .load();
217                        Map<String, KeyValue> m = new LinkedHashMap<>();
218                        for (var kv : kvs) {
219                                m.put(kv.key(), kv);
220                        }
221                        var config = new DefaultKiwiConfig("application.properties", m);
222                        config.setSystemProperties(system);
223                        return config;
224                }
225                catch (Exception e) {
226                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
227                }
228        }
229
230}
231
232final class WrapperKiwiConfig implements KiwiConfig.ReloadableConfig {
233
234        volatile KiwiConfig.StableConfig config;
235
236        public WrapperKiwiConfig(KiwiConfig.StableConfig config) {
237                super();
238                this.config = config;
239        }
240
241        @Override
242        public @Nullable String getProperty(String key) {
243                return config.getProperty(key);
244        }
245
246        @Override
247        public StableConfig stableConfig() {
248                return config;
249        }
250
251        @Override
252        public KiwiConfig reload() {
253                var c = config;
254                config = Holder.load();
255                return c;
256
257        }
258
259}
260
261final class DefaultKiwiConfig implements KiwiConfig.StableConfig {
262
263        private final String description;
264
265        private final Map<String, KeyValue> keyValues;
266
267        public DefaultKiwiConfig(String description, Map<String, KeyValue> keyValues) {
268                super();
269                this.description = description;
270                this.keyValues = keyValues;
271        }
272
273        @Override
274        public @Nullable String getProperty(String key) {
275                var kv = keyValues.get(key);
276                if (kv != null) {
277                        return kv.expanded();
278                }
279                return null;
280        }
281
282        @Override
283        public String describe(String key) {
284                return this.description;
285        }
286
287        @Override
288        public Map<String, String> toMap() {
289                return toMap(keyValues);
290        }
291
292        private static Map<String, String> toMap(Map<String, KeyValue> kvs) {
293                Map<String, String> m = new LinkedHashMap<>();
294                for (var e : kvs.entrySet()) {
295                        m.put(e.getKey(), e.getValue().value());
296                }
297                return Map.copyOf(m);
298        }
299
300        void setSystemProperties(KeyValuesSystem system) {
301                var logger = system.environment().getLogger();
302                Map<String, String> properties = toMap();
303
304                Map<String, String> propertiesToBeSet = new LinkedHashMap<>();
305
306                final Set<String> commandLineProperties = getJvmCommandLinePropertyNames();
307                for (Entry<String, String> e : properties.entrySet()) {
308                        if (commandLineProperties.contains(e.getKey())) {
309                                logger.info("Not overriding command line property: " + e.getKey());
310                        }
311                        else if (denyPropertyToBeOverridden(e.getKey())) {
312                                logger.info("Not overriding restricted property: " + e.getKey());
313                        }
314                        else {
315                                if (Objects.isNull(e.getValue())) {
316                                        logger.warn("Property key: " + e.getKey() + " is null");
317                                }
318                                else {
319                                        propertiesToBeSet.put(e.getKey(), e.getValue());
320                                }
321                        }
322                }
323                propertiesToBeSet.put("SYSTEM_PROPERTIES_LOADED", "true");
324                var systemProperties = system.environment().getSystemProperties();
325                for (var e : propertiesToBeSet.entrySet()) {
326                        systemProperties.setProperty(e.getKey(), e.getValue());
327                }
328
329        }
330
331        static boolean denyPropertyToBeOverridden(@Nullable String property) {
332                if (property == null)
333                        return true;
334
335                return (property.startsWith("java.") || property.startsWith("sun.") || property.equals("user.dir")
336                                || property.equals("user.name") || property.equals("path.separator") || property.startsWith("os."));
337        }
338
339        Set<String> getJvmCommandLinePropertyNames() {
340                if (!isJmxModuleAvailable()) {
341                        return Collections.emptySet();
342                }
343                try {
344                        List<String> args = ManagementFactory.getRuntimeMXBean().getInputArguments();
345                        if (args.isEmpty()) {
346                                return Collections.emptySet();
347                        }
348                        Set<String> props = new HashSet<>(args.size());
349                        for (String s : args) {
350                                s = s.trim();
351                                if (!s.startsWith("-D")) {
352                                        continue;
353                                }
354                                int end = s.indexOf("=");
355                                props.add(s.substring(2, end > 3 ? end : s.length()));
356                        }
357                        return props;
358                }
359                catch (Throwable e) {
360                        return Collections.emptySet();
361                }
362        }
363
364        private static boolean isJmxModuleAvailable() {
365                ModuleLayer bootLayer = ModuleLayer.boot();
366                return bootLayer.findModule("java.management").isPresent();
367        }
368
369}
